GSD.description:
media: meson: vdec: fix possible refcount leak in vdec_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.224 by commit 70119756311a0be3b95bec2e1ba714673e90feba. For more details please see the references link.
